name: Shinkai: Create Pet Website
description: Creates a website for a pet and stores the information in SQL
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: pet_websites
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE pet_websites (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, pet_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, pet_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, photo_count INTEGER NOT NULL, file_path TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: List all pet websites
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM pet_websites ORDER BY created_at DESC
